channel.title: The Cloudflare Blog
channel.description: Get the latest news on how products at Cloudflare are built, technologies used, and join the teams helping to build a better Internet.

item.title: 【Making Application Security simple with a new unified dashboard experience】通过新的统一仪表板体验使应用程序安全简单
item.description: 【 We’re introducing a new Application Security experience in the Cloudflare dashboard, with a reworked UI organized by use cases, making it easier for customers to navigate and secure their accounts. 】我们正在CloudFlare仪表板中引入新的应用程序安全体验，并通过用例组织了重新设计的UI，使客户更容易导航和保护其帐户。

item.title: 【Simplify allowlist management and lock down origin access with Cloudflare Aegis】用Cloudflare Aegis简化允许列表管理和锁定Origin访问
item.description: 【 Cloudflare Aegis provides dedicated egress IPs for Zero Trust origin access strategies, now supporting BYOIP and customer-facing configurability, with observability of Aegis IP utilization soon. 】Cloudflare Aegis为零信任的来源访问策略提供专用的出口IP，现在支持BYOIP和面向客户的可配置性，并且很快就可以观察到AEGIS IP利用率。

item.title: 【HTTPS-only for Cloudflare APIs: shutting the door on cleartext traffic】仅https for Cloudflare API：在ClearText流量上关闭门
item.description: 【 We are closing the cleartext HTTP ports entirely for Cloudflare API traffic. This prevents the risk of clients unintentionally leaking their secret API keys in cleartext during the initial request. 】我们将完全关闭ClearText HTTP端口，用于CloudFlare API流量。这可以防止客户在初始请求期间无意间在ClearText中泄露其秘密API键的风险。

item.title: 【Improved Bot Management flexibility and visibility with new high-precision heuristics】通过新的高精度启发式方法提高了机器人管理的灵活性和可见度
item.description: 【 By building and integrating a new heuristics framework into the Cloudflare Ruleset Engine, we now have a more flexible system to write rules and deploy new releases rapidly. 】通过将新的启发式框架构建和集成到Cloudflare Ruleset引擎中，我们现在有一个更灵活的系统来编写规则并迅速部署新版本。

item.title: 【Cloudflare named a leader in Web Application Firewall Solutions in 2025 Forrester report】CloudFlare在2025年Forrester报告中将Web应用程序解决方案的领导
item.description: 【 Forrester Research has recognized Cloudflare as a Leader in its The Forrester Wave™: Web Application Firewall Solutions, Q1 2025 report. 】Forrester Research已将CloudFlare认识到其Forrester Wave™中的领导者：Web应用程序防火墙解决方案，第1季度2025年报告。

item.title: 【Improved support for private applications and reusable access policies with Cloudflare Access】改善了对私人应用程序的支持，并通过CloudFlare访问可重复使用的访问策略
item.description: 【 We are excited to introduce support for private hostname and IP address-defined applications as well as reusable access policies. 】我们很高兴为私人主机名和IP地址定义的应用程序以及可重复使用的访问策略提供支持。

item.title: 【Take control of public AI application security with Cloudflare's Firewall for AI】使用Cloudflare的防火墙来控制公共AI应用程序安全
item.description: 【 Firewall for AI discovers and protects your public LLM-powered applications, and is seamlessly integrated with Cloudflare WAF. Join the beta now and take control of your generative AI security. 】AI的防火墙发现并保护您的公共LLM驱动应用程序，并与Cloudflare WAF无缝集成。立即加入Beta，并控制您的生成AI安全性。

item.title: 【Cloudflare for AI: supporting AI adoption at scale with a security-first approach】AI的CloudFlare：以安全优先的方法进行大规模支持AI采用
item.description: 【 With Cloudflare for AI, developers, security teams and content creators can leverage Cloudflare’s network and portfolio of tools to secure, observe and make AI applications resilient and safe to use. 】借助AI的CloudFlare，开发人员，安全团队和内容创建者可以利用Cloudflare的网络和工具组合来保护，观察和使AI应用程序具有弹性且安全使用。

item.title: 【Trapping misbehaving bots in an AI Labyrinth】在AI迷宫中捕获不良的机器人
item.description: 【 How Cloudflare uses generative AI to slow down, confuse, and waste the resources of AI Crawlers and other bots that don’t respect “no crawl” directives. 】CloudFlare如何使用生成的AI减慢，混淆和浪费不尊重“无爬行”指令的AI爬网机的资源和其他机器人的资源。

item.title: 【Introducing Cloudy, Cloudflare’s AI agent for simplifying complex configurations】介绍Cloudflare的Cloudflare的AI代理，用于简化复杂配置
item.description: 【 Cloudflare’s first AI agent, Cloudy, helps make complicated configurations easy to understand for Cloudflare administrators. 】Cloudflare的第一个AI代理Cloudy有助于使CloudFlare管理员易于理解复杂的配置。
